sense.name: figure out, calculate, find the answer
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1 SOLVE NP2 Note: implies a punctual point of resolution in time for NP2
sense.examples: Solve the following two quadratic equations. She was trying to solve a really tough crossword pussle. John can solve any engine problems with your car. Police couldn't solve the case. He solved the Rubiks cube in record time.

sense.name: successfully manage a conflict
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1 SOLVE NP2 Note: implies a durative change of state for NP2
sense.examples: The issue was solved by our agreeing to disagree. She thinks every problem can be solved with money. Did you solve the problem with your boss? Help solve the illegal immigration crisis!

sense.name: settle, square up, as with debts
sense.examples: He has solved his old debts.
